bibl.title: The Archive of Hor. (Excavations at North Saqqârah. Docum. Ser. I. Texts from Excavations. 2.)
bibl.note: Pp. 1-6: The Greek Texts. Reproduit les ostraca publiés par: T.C. Skeat et E.G. Turner, JEA 1968 (avec addition d'un nouveau fragment).
Ray J.D., The Archive of Hor. (Excavations at North Saqqârah. Docum. Ser. I. Texts from Excavations. 2.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1976, 4°, xv-192 pp., 4 figg. et 39 pll.
